BiblioData.Title: METHOD FOR PREPARING AN ORGANIC FILM AT THE SURFACE OF A SOLID SUBSTRATE IN NON- ELECTROCHEMICAL CONDITIONS, SOLID SUBSTRATE THUS FORMED AND PREPARATION KIT

Applicant.Name: COMMISSARIAT ENERGIE ATOMIQUE [FR]
COMMISSARIAT A L'ENERGIE ATOMIQUE
COMMISSARIAT A L'ENERGIE ATOMIQUE ET AUX ENERGIESALTERNATIVES

BiblioData.Abstract: The surface of a solid support is contacted with a liquid solution containing protic solvent(s) and adhesion primer(s) under non-electrochemical conditions, and radical entities are formed based on the adhesion primer. An organic film is formed at the surface of solid support. An independent claim is included for non-electrically conductive solid support.
